com.pb.sawdust.io

Class ByteOrderDataOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • com.pb.sawdust.io.ByteOrderDataOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ByteOrderDataOutputStream
extends java.io.FilterOutputStream
implements java.io.DataOutput
    The ByteOrderDataOutputStream is a data output stream which allows the endianness of the output to be specified.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.FilterOutputStream

        out

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteOrderDataOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out, java.nio.ByteOrder endianness)
      Constructor specifying the output stream and its endianness.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      void writeBoolean(boolean v) 
      void writeByte(int v)

      void writeFloat(float v) 
      void writeInt(int v) 
      void writeLong(long v) 
      void writeShort(int v) 
      void writeUTF(java.lang.String s)
      Since the modified UTF-8 format specified by this method is byte-order independent, only the leading (short) string length specifier is affected by the endianness of the output stream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.io.FilterOutputStream

        flush, write, write, write
